name: Owl

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit  reach 5 ft.  one target. Hit: 1 slashing damage. If this damage would reduce a Small or larger target to 0 hit points  the target takes no damage from this attack.

special_abilities.name: Flyby
special_abilities.desc: The owl doesnt provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of a creatures reach.

special_abilities.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
special_abilities.desc: The owl has advantage on Perception checks that rely on hearing and sight.
